screenshot.caption: VSP file open in Corel VideoStudio 2023

description: VideoStudio is a video editor for home and small business users that allows them to create polished movies from imported or recorded video clips. The software is available in Ultimate and Pro editions, with Ultimate providing more features than Pro.
When creating a slideshow or movie, you can save your edits as a VSP project file, which you can close and re-open to edit. To create a VideoStudio VSP project file, follow these steps:
NOTE: Corel acquired VideoStudio from Ulead in 2006.
